title: Verify default view only displays last 30 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user's notifications widget loads
custom_expected: THEN the notification widget should only show the last 30 days (filter at the top is set to 30 days prior - today)

title: Verify default widget displays notifications generated in the last 6 months
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has logged in and located the notifications widget
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to change the "from" date filter
custom_expected: THEN they will only be able to select a date that is exactly 6 months past from the present date.

title: Agent profiles display in widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD wants to view a directory of agent profiles
custom_steps: WHEN the LRD locates the Agents Widget
custom_expected:
THEN the agent profiles should be reflected in the Agents Widget
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=dashboard

title: Filter Agents widget to only see Active Agents
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to filter search results in the agent widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the Active filter in the header
custom_expected: THEN only Active Agents will display in the widget

title: Filter Agents widget to only see Inactive Agents
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to filter search results in the agent widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the Inactive filter in the header
custom_expected: THEN only Inactive Agents will display in the widget

title: Filter Agents widget to see All Agents
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to filter search results in the agent widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the All filter in the header
custom_expected: THEN All agent profiles will display, Active and Inactive

title: Filter widget using Filter Icon
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has clicked on the Filter Icon in the Agents Widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user types in a criteria and clicks Apply
custom_expected: THEN only results that match the criteria will show

title: Open Agent profile from widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to open agent profile from the agent widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the agent hyperlink
custom_expected: THEN that agent profile opens

title: Open Agency Profile from Agents widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to open an agency profile from the agent widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the agency hyperlink
custom_expected: THEN that agency profile opens

title: BOC creates new agent profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to create a new agent profile and has permissions
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to create new button on the agent widget
custom_expected: THEN a new agent profile will load in edit mode

title: BOC saves new agent profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to save a new agent profile and has permission
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the save button
custom_expected:
THEN the system runs a rules check
AND the profile saves
AND the profile is visible in the agent widget

title: BOC adds Address to agent profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to add an address to an agent's profile and has permission
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is in edit mode and clicks the 'Add Address' button
AND there are multiple addresses saved
custom_expected:
THEN a new editable field will load with a trash icon
IF there is only one address there shouldn't be a trash icon

title: Indicate Agent's primary Address
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to specify an agent's primary address and there is more than one address
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'Make Primary' and saves the profile
custom_expected: THEN that address should be shown first

title: BOC adds Phone number to agent profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to add a phone number to an agent's profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'add number'
custom_expected: THEN a new phone number field is populated

title: Indicate Agent's primary Phone Number
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user want's to specify an Agent's primary Phone Number
AND there are multiple phone numbers saved
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'make primary' option
custom_expected: THEN that should be the first number displayed

title: BOC adds Email to agent profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to add an email to an Agent's profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'Add Email'
custom_expected: THEN a new set of editable fields populates

title: Indicate Agent's primary Email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to specify an Agent's primary Email
AND there are multiple Emails entered
custom_steps: WHEN user selects 'Make Primary'
custom_expected: THEN that email is listed first

title: Verify list of players associated with Agent
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to verify a player is associated with an Agent
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects an Agent's profile
custom_expected: THEN all players associated with that agent will be displayed

title: Receive Error if Required fields are not filled out
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has not filled out all required fields while creating a new agent profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks SAVE
custom_expected: THEN they will receive an error message of the required fields that need to be filled out

title: Verify BOC can view directory of agencies
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view the directory of agencies
custom_steps: WHEN the user scans their Agency widget
custom_expected: THEN all agencies should be listed

title: Verify historical agency profiles
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view historical agency profiles
custom_steps: WHEN the user sorts through their Agency widget
custom_expected: THEN all agency profiles are reflected in the new system

title: Filter Agency widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to filter their Agency widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a filter
custom_expected: THEN only relevant matches are displayed

title: Open Agency profile from widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to open an Agency profile from their widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a hyperlink from the widget
custom_expected: THEN an Agency profile opens in view mode

title: BOC creates a new agency profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to create a new agency profile and has permission
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'create new' from agency widget
custom_expected: THEN a new Agency profile will open in edit mode

title: BOC saves a new agency profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to save an agency profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the 'save' button in the Agency profile
custom_expected:
THEN the system runs a rules check and profile is saved
AND Profile appears in Agency widget

title: BOC adds Address to agency profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to add an address to an agency profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'add address'
custom_expected: THEN a new set of editable fields populates

title: Indicate Agency's primary Address
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to specify an Agency's primary address
AND there are multiple addresses saved
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'make primary'
custom_expected: THEN that address is listed first

title: BOC adds Phone Number to agency profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to add a phone number to agency profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'add number' from agency profile
custom_expected: THEN a new set of editable fields populates

title: Indicate Agency's primary Phone Number
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to specify an Agency's primary Phone Number
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'make primary' in the Agency's profile
custom_expected: THEN that phone number is listed first

title: Verify list of agents associated with Agency
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view a list of agents associated with an Agency
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to an Agency's profile
custom_expected: THEN all active agents associated with the Agency profile are listed

title: Verify list of players associated with Agency
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view a list of players associated with an Agency
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Agency's profile
custom_expected: THEN all players associated with that Agency will be listed

title: View custom language in textbox
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has entered custom language in a textbox
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates away from custom language and goes back
custom_expected: THEN custom language is still displayed in textbox

title: Enter complex language in performance bonus clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to enter complex language in a performance bonus clause
custom_steps:
WHEN user has clicked "Add Clause" button
AND chosen "Complex" from the "Criteria" dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the WISYWIG editor will display

title: Save complex language
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to save a complex language clause
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects complex from the language drop down
AND has entered text in the WISYWIG editor
AND clicks save
custom_expected: THEN entered text will save and appear when contract is opened next

title: View various stored languages
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user wants to view various stored languages
AND the utility is loaded with different languages
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the drop down menu
custom_expected: THEN all of the stored languages will display

title: View stored languages directly on contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user wants to view the stored languages on a contract's clause
AND the contract's clause has a stored language
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the 'view' option for the stored language
custom_expected: THEN the stored language will open in a new window/tab

title: Verify most likely matches in Quicksearch
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is searching for a player using the quicksearch feature
custom_steps: WHEN the user types in 3 letters of a players name
custom_expected:
THEN the results of the 3 letters are highlighted in bold
AND results display at the top any matches closest to Last name, followed by those closest to First name and Roster name matches
AND matches displayed should then be sorted alphabetically based on Last name, then Roster name and then First name (after taking into consideration match closeness from above AC)

title: Verify Advanced Search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user wants to do an advanced search
AND "Search" appears as an option in the left navigation for all users.
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the search button
custom_expected: THEN the advanced search page loads

title: View Award Entry Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user want to view a player's awards
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects Major Contracts from the left nav
custom_expected: THEN user is taken to the award entry utility

title: Verify 'Year' dropdown contains entry for each year of players record (No Position)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in Award Entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the 'Year' dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the dropdown will display an entry for each year from the current year to the first year of record (1991)

title: Verify 'League' dropdown (No Position)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to the award entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the 'league' dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the 'league' dropdown contains AL, NL and a blank tab

title: Verify 'Award' dropdown (No Position)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to the award entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the 'award' dropdown
custom_expected: THEN all awards are listed alphabetically

title: Select "Most AS Votes- Overall" Award (No Position)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to award entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'Most AS Votes- Overall'
custom_expected: THEN 'league' dropdown is set to blank and disabled

title: Select "World Series MVP" Award (No Position)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to award entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'World Series MVP' under the award dropdown
custom_expected: THEN 'league' dropdown is left blank and disabled

title: Verify 'Position' dropdown
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to award entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN the position dropdown is clicked
custom_expected: THEN positions are displayed in dropdown list

title: Select an award and verify Position
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to the award entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN an award is selected from the drop down that corresponds with a position
custom_expected: THEN system will disable position drop down in table

title: Select an award that does NOT have a Position
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to award entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN user enters an award that does not have a position
custom_expected:
THEN Position field is defaulted to blank 
AND has no additional values

title: Set contract to "Approved for Next Year"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has an approved contract for the current year
AND creates a contract with a future start date for the same player
custom_steps: WHEN the user approves the second contract
custom_expected: THEN the updated status should be "Approved for Next Year'

title: Expire contract so Approved for Next Year becomes Approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has an 'Approved for Next Year' contract via the steps in [C68758]
custom_steps: WHEN the 'Approved' contract expires
custom_expected: THEN the 'Approved for Next Year' contract should be moved to 'Approved'
